A B C G I M O P R S U

A

Action - Annotation Type in org.mvp4j.annotation
The scope of this annotation is the view, use this annotation to define an action to be executed when a certain event has happened in a component of the view.
ActionBinding - Interface in org.mvp4j.adapter
This interface is used to retrieve the binding informations between the event of the current component in the view and associated action method in the presenter and simplify add event and action call operations when writing the ActionComponenet to support a specific component during implementing an adapter class MVPAdapter to a specific library.
ActionComponent - Class in org.mvp4j.adapter
This class is used to simplify the binding between the event of the current component in the view and associated action in the presenter and simplify add event and action call operations during implementing an adapter class MVPAdapter to a specific library.
ActionComponent() - Constructor for class org.mvp4j.adapter.ActionComponent
 
ActionNotFoundException - Exception in org.mvp4j.exception
A runtime exception that describes that an Action could not be found.
ActionNotFoundException(String, Object) - Constructor for exception org.mvp4j.exception.ActionNotFoundException
Constructs a new exception instance with the specified detail message.
Actions - Annotation Type in org.mvp4j.annotation
The scope of this annotation is the view, use this annotation to define more than one action in the same view component
AppController - Interface in org.mvp4j
The application entry to process view class and bind the view instance with it's model and presenter instances.
